base_description: Compact, rectangular, black coffee machine with buttons.
part_description: Includes a drip tray, control panel with buttons, spout, and cup area, all arranged on the front. The drip tray is at the bottom, buttons on top, and spout centrally positioned.
internal_interaction_description: The control panel buttons activate internal mechanisms to brew coffee. The spout dispenses coffee into a cup placed on the drip tray, which collects excess liquid. Internal components heat water and manage coffee grounds for brewing.
external_interaction_description: Users interact by pressing buttons to select coffee options. A cup is placed under the spout to collect coffee. The machine can be connected to a power source and water supply, and interacts with coffee grounds or pods.
